output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a malicious contract to steal arbitrary tokens.
sell function generates a random number in sellPrice variable, allowing attackers to always win the game.
buy function allows attackers to acquire tokens for free, due to incorrect access control in fallback function.
transfer function allows attackers to acquire tokens for free, due to incorrect access control in transferFrom function.
